The appeal of the {@Rgn:50008} to me as a scholar is that it somehow avoids most of the argons' corruption. How did it stave off the argon transformative magic?

The implications stagger the imagination."And you need some help."

Quite so. These shambling creepers were once gorgeous flowers before the argons reshaped them.

Use this tyalinth blossom on the creepers. Let's see if we can undo the argons' damage.
Most promising results! If I can adapt the method to other creatures, we might just reclaim our world.
